lead_paragraph: Marcello Lippi said his first priority as China coach is to restore some confidence to his players as he looks to breathe some life into their faltering campaign to qualify for the 2018 World Cup.

headline.print_headline: New China Coach Lippi Looks to Restore Confidence
headline.main: New China Coach Lippi Looks to Restore Confidence

snippet: Marcello Lippi said his first priority as China coach is to restore some confidence to his players as he looks to breathe some life into their faltering campaign to qualify for the 2018 World Cup....
